import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import cross from '../../assets/cross.png' import './Login.css' const Login = () => { const[currState,setCurrState] = useState("SingUp") return (

{currState}

setShowLogin(false)} src={cross} alt="" />
{currState==="LogIn"?<>:}

By continuing I agree to the terms of use & privacy policy

{currState==="LogIn" ?

Create a new account? < span onClick={()=>setCurrState("SignUp")}>Click Here!

:

Already have an account? < span onClick={()=>setCurrState("LogIn")}>Log in here!

}
) } export default Login
